sub_033_ecology_01:
[VAR BD06(0000)]Hello, hello, [VAR TRNAME(0000)]. This
is Jacq.[VAR 0114(002A)]
sub_033_ecology_02:
Thanks for taking on all those Tera Raid Battles
for us![VAR 0114(002A)]
sub_033_ecology_03:
[VAR BD06(0000)]Our investigation is moving along thanks to you,
[VAR TRNAME(0000)]—we have some new data.[VAR 0114(002A)]
sub_033_ecology_04:
It seems that Terastal energy is released from
the Great Crater of Paldea from time to time,\r
and that’s having an effect on the crystals.[VAR 0114(002A)]
sub_033_ecology_05:
Tera Raid crystals that get hit by especially strong
blasts of this energy are apparently transforming\r
into [VAR COLOR(0006)]black crystals[VAR COLOR(0000)].[VAR 0114(002A)]
sub_033_ecology_06:
The Tera Pokémon inside these black crystals are
incredibly powerful...[VAR 0114(002A)]
sub_033_ecology_07:
So much so that average Trainers wouldn’t stand
a chance against them.[VAR 0114(002A)]
sub_033_ecology_08:
[VAR BD06(0000)]You’re anything but average, but I’m afraid this is
too dangerous—even for you,\r
[VAR TRNAME(0000)].[VAR 0114(002A)]
sub_033_ecology_09:
Even if you find the location of one of these
black crystals on your map app, please do NOT—\r
I repeat—DO NOT take on the Tera Raid there![VAR 0114(002A)]
sub_033_ecology_10:
Hmmm... You almost seem a little TOO willing to
agree.[VAR 0114(002A)]
sub_033_ecology_11:
I mean it! Don’t read into that like there’s some
kind of hidden meaning![VAR 0114(002A)]
sub_033_ecology_12:
Sorry for getting you involved in this only to ask
you to step away, but...\c
Whatever you do, do NOT go looking for these
black crystals![VAR 0114(002A)]
sub_033_ecology_13:
I’m counting on you to make the right choice
here![VAR 0114(002A)]
